attributes.long-description:
This bundle contains: Draw Slasher FULL GAME and HANZO AVATAR.

Buy now and get the avatar free.


Meet Hanzo. He’s a ninja. While he was training ‘out there’ the Pirate Monkey Zombies™ - stupid, ugly, smelly, rotten and disgusting creatures - kidnapped his family. Take control of his awesome blade and aid him in the quest to free them.

You need just your finger to play. Draw a line to jump, dash, dodge and slash. Tap to run. Pinch the screen to summon powerful Ninjutsu Techniques - super-efficient against the 'rottents'.

YOUR FINGER IS THE ULTIMATE WEAPON!

FEATURES:
• Unique intuitive touchscreen controls
• Story
• Challenges
• Endless Arcade: Survival and Gatekeeper
• Upgradeable Ninjutsu Techniques

Cut, slice, snip, sever, chop, shear and trim hordes of Pirate Monkey Zombies™.

And wear a helmet - you got only one brain!

Draw Slasher Bundle (Full game + Hanzo Avatar)

Compatible with PlayStation®Vita only.
Gameplay requires PlayStation®Vita memory card (sold separately).
1MB minimum space required
1 Player
Touchscreen
This product supports the following languages: In-game speech: English On-screen text: English.

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account. 

All rights reserved ©Mass Creation
